HOME REMEDIES: 1. A saltwater gargle — 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon salt dissolved in an 8-ounce glass of warm water — can temporarily relieve a sore or scratchy throat.
2. Over-the-counter saline nasal drops and sprays can help relieve stuffiness and congestion.
3. Stay hydrated. Water, juice, clear broth or warm lemon water with honey helps loosen congestion and prevents dehydration.
